internalTitle.en-US: TEMPLATE - Block - Media Circle on Left

content.value: Harness the power of handlebars templates to work with context about your data, your organization, or yourself. Control what context fields you want to use, such as brand voice, skill levels, and applications used. Sidekick Studio allows you to customize your AI's understanding to match your unique context.

With Sidekick Studio, you have complete control over your AI Sidekicks. Create new sidekicks, edit their goals, AI models, and interaction styles. Share your sidekicks with your team or keep them exclusively for yourself. Sidekick Studio enables you to customize your AI to perfectly fit your needs.
